attributes.background: Nobody in the House of Lords is elected, they are a waste of Tax payers money, they sleep rather than debate and spend £77k a year on wine. In a democratic system all representatives should be elected by the people, the lords are appointed by the Queen which contradicts the definition of democracy

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104594

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
